alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Custer; Garfield; Logan; Loup; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 10:23PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Loup, northeastern Lincoln, Logan, southwestern Garfield, northern Custer, southern Blaine and southeastern Thomas Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1020 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms extending from near Calamus Reservoir State Recreation Area to 7 miles northeast of Ringgold. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Broken Bow, Stapleton, Taylor, Arnold, Callaway, Sargent, Merna, Anselmo, Gandy, Logan, Milburn. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 99 and 136. Highway 2 between mile markers 240 and 283. Highway 92 between mile markers 219 and 273. Interstate 80 in Nebraska near mile marker 181. Highway 83 between mile markers 91 and 128. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Blaine; Custer; Garfield; Logan; Loup; Thomas
